title: Finally Gold 5!
body:
After numerous tries in promos and losing and winning non promo games and getting 99 lp ( 1 lp off rito y) i have finally got gold.

Yes this is Molendo.

Time to name change?

replies.body: grats mate :) did it myself about a week ago thank god :)
thanks !
Only took you 800 games, lmfao.
Do you want to turn into SackBoy?

> Do you want to turn into SackBoy?

I think he wants to be me, sadly he is bronze and I am not.
Haha, he's not even bronze, he's unranked.

> Haha, he's not even bronze, he's unranked.

That isn't his main account. He uses it so he can pretend that he isn't bronze.
Season 3 Stargate Universe confirmed.
oce skin confirmed
Nope. Smurfs don't count. Only the main Molendo account has to get gold.
this has always been my main

The God.

A new avatar is in order.
Yep
Classic.

Nearly 400 games...what the %%%% is wrong with you? Anyway good job!
Congrats, buddy. Shame you didn't make it before the end of the season.
Congrats dude!!!
ty seph! Might see you in future ranked games aye?

It means something, it means his MMR is at least Gold and therefore has a significantly higher chance of being placed G5 or higher next season. Just say 'Congrats' and move on, if you don't have anything nice to say, best to say nothing at all, yo.

EDIT: Congrats dude, I never bothered ranking and kinda regretted it, I missed out on the last week cause of exams too so in the last couple of days got myself to the position I'm in now, next game I'm in G5 promos. Lots can still go wrong but yo I'mma try and do my best for you, ^_^.
ty for ur input
get mad pls
Congrats on your most recent achievement mate :)
ty
Congrats! I want to start playing ranked again, getting jelly.
